name: Delabs Games
description: Delabs Games is reimagining how we play â€“ bringing proven Web2 IPs into bold, mid-core experiences designed mobile-first, social-integrated, and blockchain enhanced. Delabs is focusing on mid-core games designed for social platforms people already use such as LINE and Telegram. Mid-core games are games that are easy to start, but hard to master. Those with depth, progression, and social competition perfect for onboarding users and securing retention. The games in the Delabs ecosystem bring globally recognized IPs into Web3-native experiences that feel familiar, fun, and frictionless. No wallets required to start. Just gameplay-first design that pulls players in, and token powered systems that keep them engaged.
